(Dresses&Sets) --- Pink Baby Skirt & Top Set (me in the BABY set) Starting Bid:$325 + shipping Size: Small (Bust: ~32in; Waist: ~25in) Decription: Ordered from the Japanese brand-name store BABY, the Stars Shine Bright. This lacy top and skirt set is now no longer available from their store and was bought a year ago. It is execellently made. The top has a satin/silky lining along with a few pieces of boning inside for a corset-like stability. The skirt also is lined in the same silky fabric and has a slightly stiff built-in pannier. Both pieces are made in a suede/velvet-type fabric accented with perfectly matched cotton cluny laces and grosgrain ribbon. Alternative Views: (Close-up of the Top)(Side View)(Front View)(Better View of the Skirt) --- Burgundy Victorain Maiden Reproduction Dress Starting Bid:$225 + shipping (Buy it Now: $300) Size: Plus-Sized (Bust 39-45in; Waist 26-45in; Hips up to 45in) Decription: This lovely dress was made by a professional seamstress and original cost $400. It is a reproduction of a dress by Victorian Maiden (as seen in this photo in the Gothic&Lolita Bible). It is made of a very soft suede-like material and is serged on the inside seams. There is a black satin ribbon at the neckline that ties about the neck, and corset-lacing (of the same satin ribbon) on each side so the wearer can form-fit it to their own curves. Alternative Views: (Close-up of the Corset-lacing)(Close-up of the Bottom Ruffle)(Close-up of the Bodice) --- Cherry Lolita Skirt, Bloomers&Accessory Set Starting Bid:$40 + shipping Size: ~28in (fitted waist) Decription: This sweet set is made from a lovely cherry-print fabric I found. The set includes matching: skirt, bloomers, neck corset, and headdress. (All would normally go for around $70 total, but I am giving a discount since some of the tulle in the skirt's built-in petticoat is worn.) The skirt has a fitting waist that zips and hooks at the back. Underneath it has a mini-pannier whose hem is accented with lace. Bloomers for wear beneath, and in a matching fabric, are of the shortner variety and are also accented with white lace. Then, as a final touch, the accessories all match the other pieces and have similar white lace accents.
